Lua Form: 
400==tonumber((34+91+97+54+54+90-97+97-85+85-39+39/57+57-34-64+64-46+46/80+80/6+6+67-76+76-48+48/73+73-83+83/63+63/96+96/45+45-76+76-37/71/55/99-44+44-21/47-35/90-82+82-53+53-78+78/73+73/84+84/90+90-11-18/82/65/25/63/66-78+78-94+94-73+73-93+93/65+65/37+37+75/13+13-34+34-90+90-59+59-78+78/63+63+23-31+31/36+36/48+48/15+15/4+4+9-90+90-75+75-80+80/4+4+77-57+57-37+37-9-29+29/25+25/26+26/10+10/68+68-91+91-45-17/97-21+21/32+32-17/87/94/35/63/98-95+95/51+51+42/11+11-37+37-17+17-56+56/21+21+16+49-92+92/94+94-32-60+60-50+50/30+30+22-47+47/83+83-17-12/96-81+81-41+41-95+95/77+77-24+24/32+32-7-34+34/55+55-18/39/22/33-94+94/42+42+43-99+99-88+88-70+70/38+38+41/85+85-58/80-77/95-4-99+99/43+43-34+34/45+45/66+66/89+89/34+34/11+11/28+28/97+97-19-47/19-76+76-47-14/91/8-9/75/42-32+32/44+44-26/44/73/52-57+57-97+97/80+80/91+91/27+27+70-49+49/7/93+93-6/46-38/25/81-34/73-50-64+64/58+58/1-33/46/15-46+46/27+27/32+32-26+26-1/26/10-69+69-25+25/69+69/56+56-69+69-81+81-6-22/93-76+76-26-55+55-89+89/99+99/96+96/30+30+3+57/55+55-75+75-32+32/25+25-37+37-54+54-17-52+52/2+2+88-18-87+87-33/29-71+71/10+10+82-24-19/71-75+75/38+38-26+26/7+7-72+72/31+31+5+28+44/38+38/6-28+28-73+73/29+29+57/60+60/18+18+92/30+30/16+16/42+42/10+10/60+60/91+91/83+83-98+98-24/76-34-81+81-3-5-95+95-5-29-63+63-77+77/37+37+70-74+74-13/21-23/7/91/41-80+80/87+87-23-5-8/62-88+88-80+80-99+99-26+26/96+96-46-97+97-54+54/16+16/20+20-45+45/40+40-4/26/25-86+86/53+53+22+58-41-89+89/82+82/82+82-64+64/7+7+96/10+10+24-75+75-57+57/13+13+46-17+17-5-17+17-99+99-38+38-27+27/16+16+83-15/58-99+99-27/23/63-95+95/67+67-59+59/16+16-28+28/58+58/4/59+59/89+89/94+94/99+99-72/3-64+64-51/76/21-54/63/67/42/30/81/80/43-99+99/76+76-5-76+76/19+19+10+82/13-42+42/51+51-9.972236227183373).."")
=====================
Base Form:
34+91+97+54+54+90-97+97-85+85-39+39/57+57-34-64+64-46+46/80+80/6+6+67-76+76-48+48/73+73-83+83/63+63/96+96/45+45-76+76-37/71/55/99-44+44-21/47-35/90-82+82-53+53-78+78/73+73/84+84/90+90-11-18/82/65/25/63/66-78+78-94+94-73+73-93+93/65+65/37+37+75/13+13-34+34-90+90-59+59-78+78/63+63+23-31+31/36+36/48+48/15+15/4+4+9-90+90-75+75-80+80/4+4+77-57+57-37+37-9-29+29/25+25/26+26/10+10/68+68-91+91-45-17/97-21+21/32+32-17/87/94/35/63/98-95+95/51+51+42/11+11-37+37-17+17-56+56/21+21+16+49-92+92/94+94-32-60+60-50+50/30+30+22-47+47/83+83-17-12/96-81+81-41+41-95+95/77+77-24+24/32+32-7-34+34/55+55-18/39/22/33-94+94/42+42+43-99+99-88+88-70+70/38+38+41/85+85-58/80-77/95-4-99+99/43+43-34+34/45+45/66+66/89+89/34+34/11+11/28+28/97+97-19-47/19-76+76-47-14/91/8-9/75/42-32+32/44+44-26/44/73/52-57+57-97+97/80+80/91+91/27+27+70-49+49/7/93+93-6/46-38/25/81-34/73-50-64+64/58+58/1-33/46/15-46+46/27+27/32+32-26+26-1/26/10-69+69-25+25/69+69/56+56-69+69-81+81-6-22/93-76+76-26-55+55-89+89/99+99/96+96/30+30+3+57/55+55-75+75-32+32/25+25-37+37-54+54-17-52+52/2+2+88-18-87+87-33/29-71+71/10+10+82-24-19/71-75+75/38+38-26+26/7+7-72+72/31+31+5+28+44/38+38/6-28+28-73+73/29+29+57/60+60/18+18+92/30+30/16+16/42+42/10+10/60+60/91+91/83+83-98+98-24/76-34-81+81-3-5-95+95-5-29-63+63-77+77/37+37+70-74+74-13/21-23/7/91/41-80+80/87+87-23-5-8/62-88+88-80+80-99+99-26+26/96+96-46-97+97-54+54/16+16/20+20-45+45/40+40-4/26/25-86+86/53+53+22+58-41-89+89/82+82/82+82-64+64/7+7+96/10+10+24-75+75-57+57/13+13+46-17+17-5-17+17-99+99-38+38-27+27/16+16+83-15/58-99+99-27/23/63-95+95/67+67-59+59/16+16-28+28/58+58/4/59+59/89+89/94+94/99+99-72/3-64+64-51/76/21-54/63/67/42/30/81/80/43-99+99/76+76-5-76+76/19+19+10+82/13-42+42/51+51-9.972236227183373
